about_the_game:
Realm of Khaos is an action platformer with a taste of science fiction. Players can fight randomly spawning enemies as more spawn throughout the level. Shoot the enemies and kill as many as you can! Try to survive for as long as you can or maybe choose to fight the boss!

Play as Marine-001 firing lasers and plasma charges, mowing through enemies as they come at you.

※Additional characters are planned to be added in a later update if enough users wish to see an update.

The laboratory researching about the Realm of Khaos has been taken over by the creatures of the Khaos Realm. Fight your way through the enemies and get to the boss to activate the portal to the Khaos Realm!

※Khaos Realm levels are planned to be added in a later update if enough users wish to see an update.
detailed_description:
Realm of Khaos is an action platformer with a taste of science fiction. Players can fight randomly spawning enemies as more spawn throughout the level. Shoot the enemies and kill as many as you can! Try to survive for as long as you can or maybe choose to fight the boss!

Play as Marine-001 firing lasers and plasma charges, mowing through enemies as they come at you.

※Additional characters are planned to be added in a later update if enough users wish to see an update.

The laboratory researching about the Realm of Khaos has been taken over by the creatures of the Khaos Realm. Fight your way through the enemies and get to the boss to activate the portal to the Khaos Realm!

※Khaos Realm levels are planned to be added in a later update if enough users wish to see an update.
name: Realm of Khaos

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E8400 or AMD Athlon 64 X2 6000+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 9600 GT or AMD HD 3870 512MB or higher
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Hardware vendor officially supported drivers. For development: IL2CPP scripting backend requires Visual Studio 2015 with C++ Tools component or later and Windows 10+ SDK
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: The Khaos Realm Laboratory has been taken over by the creatures from the Realm of Khaos. Shoot the enemies and kill as many as you can! Find the boss at the end... if you are willing to fight him.
